member.name: T:MultiPlex.Common.Utility
member.summary: The static utility class containing useful common methods.

member.name: M:MultiPlex.Common.Utility.IsDefinedOnEnum``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if the input is defined on an enumeration.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating if the input is defined on the enumeration.
member.exception: Thrown when the type T is not an enum.

member.name: M:MultiPlex.Common.Utility.ExtractTextParts(System.String)
member.summary: Will extract the text single or pair text parts of a string, separated by a |.
member.remarks: If there are 2 parts, the first is the text, and the second is the friendly text. Otherwise, only the text is set.
member.exception: Thrown when the input is null.

Thrown when the input is empty.
-- or --
Thrown when there are more than 2 parts found.

member.name: M:MultiPlex.Common.Utility.ExtractImageParts(System.String,MultiPlex.Common.ImagePartExtras)
member.summary: Will extract the single text or pair text parts of a string, separated by a |, including the dimensions for the text part.
member.param: The image part extras to extract.
member.remarks: If there are 2 parts, the first is the text, and the second is the friendly text. Otherwise, only the text is set. Also, should the text contain dimensions, they will be set.
member.exception: Thrown when the input is null.

Thrown when the input is empty.
-- or --
Thrown when there are more than 2 parts found.
-- or --
Thrown if the extracted url cannot be parsed.
-- or --
Thrown if the height/width is not a valid unit.
-- or --
Thrown when the height/width is less than or equal to zero.

members.member:
Will extract the single text or pair text parts of a string, separated by a |, including the dimensions for the text part.
The input to inspect. The image part extras to extract. Will parse the url and validate it with Uri. A new . If there are 2 parts, the first is the text, and the second is the friendly text. Otherwise, only the text is set. Also, should the text contain dimensions, they will be set. Thrown when the input is null.
Thrown when the input is empty.
-- or --
Thrown when there are more than 2 parts found.
-- or --
Thrown if the extracted url cannot be parsed when parseUrl is true.
-- or --
Thrown if the height/width is not a valid unit.
-- or --
Thrown when the height/width is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: M:MultiPlex.Common.Utility.CountChars(System.Char,System.String)
member.summary: Will count the number of occurences a character is in an string.

member.name: M:MultiPlex.Common.Utility.ExtractFragment(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex,System.String)
member.summary: Will extract the first group fragment from an input based on a regular expression.
member.returns: The extracted fragment, empty string if not found.

member.name: T:MultiPlex.Renderers

member.remarks: For convienience, all s that are shipped with MultiPlex are already registered.
